EmailTemplate.name: Jeans for Genes Day
EmailTemplate.subject: Jeans for Genes Day, Friday October 5th 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Monday, October 2nd, 2012
Dear Parents,
Jeans for Genes Day is an annual fundraising day started in the UK to raise money for people with genetic disorders. On this day people are encouraged to wear jeans to work or school in return for a charitable donation.
Please click here for more information.
Yours faithfully,
Michelle Hamilton
Secondary Phase Leader
The International School of Moscow
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
